sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-sign-in-form', templateUrl: './sign-in-form.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sign-in-form.component.scss'], }) export class SignInFormComponent { loginForm = new FormGroup({ email: new FormControl('', Validators.required), password: new FormControl('', Validators.required), }); email: string = ''; password: string = ''; input = 'password'; login2() { alert(this.loginForm.value.email + ' | ' + this.loginForm.value.password); } showPassword = false; toggleShow() { this.showPassword = !this.showPassword; this.input = this.showPassword ? 'text' : 'password'; } }
